laboratory_examinations.findings: Between 10.7 and 11.5 mg/dL initially, persistent hypercalcemia between 11.0 and 13.2 mg/dL; later 15.8 mg/dL, then fell to 11.5 mg/dL after treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Marked improvement on treatment with ketoconazole.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 1.7 mg/dL, later increased to 4.3 mg/dL, then decreased after treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant changes noted; improved renal function post-treatment.
